The Latest: Death toll rises in Iran from new coronavirus
ROME (AP) — The Latest on the coronavirus epidemic sweeping the globe (all times local): 12:40 p.m. Iran says the new coronavirus has killed another 43 people, pushing the death toll to 237 amid 7,161 confirmed cases. The Health Ministry announced the new figure at a news conference Monday. There are over 7,640 confirmed cases of the virus ...
